contentList.content: Cure a creature from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISEASED">Disease</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysis</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEAFENED">Deafeness</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLOODLESS">Bloodlessness</LSTag>.

Cure a creature from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISEASED">Disease</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysis</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEAFENED">Deafeness</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLOODLESS">Bloodlessness</LSTag>.
